resources.string: ENTER A NAME FOR YOUR RINGTONE
This app needs to change system settings in order to apply the ringtone. Do you want to allow this?

Glpyh battery indicator service for Phone(2a). Close Glyphify if you don\'t desire this feature.

Welcome! This a free to use and ad-free app made by a student. If you find value in my work and would like to show your appreciation, consider making a donation or giving a star to my GitHub repo. Any support is appreciated, thanks for reading this!
